duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare make-ready apartments, including painting, carpet repairs, cleaning, general repairs, and housekeeping duties.
Respond to resident service needs with a professional attitude and in a timely manner.
Maintain grounds, pools/hot tubs, common areas, and dog park amenities, ensuring they are clean, operational, and safe for residents.
Perform maintenance functions such as plumbing, HVAC, basic electric, general carpentry skills, painting, and snow removal (if applicable).
Report maintenance concerns on vacant units, models, and common areas to the Maintenance Supervisor.
Adhere to state, local, and federal fair housing laws.
Attend and participate in training programs as required by Cushman and Wakefield.
Deliver superior customer service, represent the company professionally, and maintain all safety procedures.
Achieve high productivity through reliable and punctual onsite attendance.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, GED, or Trade, Technical, or Vocational school
